overview: In the year 2003, three teenagers: a cynical brat Adnan, an aspirational Chandrika, and a reticent Rathore come together to forge not just a friendship...but also a marksheet. The repercussions of this minor mischief would not only unsettle their teenage lives, but also spiral into events that shocked the city. Coming of age is never a smooth run, but a three legged race.
title: Three Legged Horse
